General.Name: Hangzhou Huaguang Advanced Welding Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Huaguang Advanced Welding Materials Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sells various range of brazing alloys worldwide. Its products include silver brazing, copper-phosphorus brazing, high copper brazing, brass brazing, aluminum brazing, vacuum welding, flux-cored brazing, and flux-coated brazing alloys, as well as brazing flux. The company's products are used in the industries of HVAC/R, household appliances, electric motor, medical, electric appliances, automobiles, carbide tools, new energy equipment, railroad systems, etc. Hangzhou Huaguang Advanced Welding Materials Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
